title: 859 77 "The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!"Transliteration: "Hangyaku no Shifon – Sanji no Kēki Yusō Dai-Sakusen" (Japanese:反逆の娘（シフォン） サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦) Directed by: Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by: Masahiro Hosoda Tomohiro Nakayama October 28, 2018(2018-10-28)
transformers_text:
859 77 "The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!"Transliteration: "Hangyaku no Shifon – Sanji no Kēki Yusō Dai-Sakusen" (Japanese:反逆の娘（シフォン） サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦) Directed by: Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by: Masahiro Hosoda Tomohiro Nakayama October 28, 2018(2018-10-28)

The chefs at Cacao Island leave the Sweets Factory with the unfinished cake with plans to complete it while out at sea. However, they were approached by Oven, who intends to punish Chiffon. Meanwhile, the Fire Tank Pirates are on their way to the island. Back at Nuts Island, Luffy tries to find a mirror while fleeing from Big Mom.
